translations: n．减少，减轻：减少或减轻某事物的数量、力量或程度。
· The city offers tax abatements to encourage business development.
该市提供税收减免以鼓励商业发展。

sentences.sentence: Most controversial are the “abatements” offered to big investors that exempt them from paying property taxes to the local school districts;
sentences.translation: 最具争议的问题是是否应该废除高额投资者不用向本地学校支付财产税的“消除税”。
